title: Beautiful German apple cake
ingredients: ['4 eggs, separated', '125g caster sugar', '100g unsalted butter, melted', '1 lemon, zested and juiced', '150g plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 pinch salt', '3 to 4 apples - peeled, cored, halved and thinly sliced', 'extra sugar, for sprinkling']
